document.full_text: home depot inc  stood by its sales outlook and raised its profit forecast for the year despite a slow start to the spring selling season, making some investors choose the home improvement chain over rival lowe's.
document.title: home depot outshines lowe's, raises outlook
lines_and_colors: home depot inc  stood by its sales outlook and raised its profit forecast for the year despite a slow start to the spring selling season, making some investors choose the home improvement chain over rival lowe's.
